website_summaries.verdict: Isotoner is one of the most popular names in gloves and doesn't disappoint with this pair. Choose them if you want modern wear and attractive style by a trusted brand.
pros: Classic styling combined with leather and Spandex equals a great look and comfortable wear
SmarTouch fingertips make using device screens easy
cons: Spandex material is prone to snagging

customer_reviews.title: Not as described. No touchscreen functionality. Not for midwest cold. Maybe Florida cold.
customer_reviews.text: overall size runs true, but they have extra long fingers. Must be for extraterrestrials. The touch screen functionality is non-exsistant, the only real reason I chose these over others. The gloves are not meant for real cold weather. Even in simple 20°F weather, they did not help keep warm. They are getting sent back. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Im the Bean

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The cuff isn't long enough. Also the neoprene parts of it snag easily. I've only had them a couple months and already half of the lining has detached from the inside of one glove.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful gloves - just be aware that they do run small!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy W. Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves, snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Soft leather, stretchy fabric in between the fingers, good driving gloves for in between seasons or cool weather. Not for frigid cold, but okay for driving an enclosed vehicle no matter the season. Love them. When I mislaid them the other day, I searched and searched until I finally found them...in the glove drawer where they should have been, but of course, I looked everywhere else but...I do so love these gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Cass Wessel

customer_reviews.title: not especially true to size. I ordered the xl ...
customer_reviews.text: not especially true to size. I ordered the xl and they were too small for my hands. I don't have huge hands and my finger has already pushed through the thumb. :( They grip well and they do work on the touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Marykatherine Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Beauty, Quality, Fine Fit, & Touch Screen Success!
customer_reviews.text: Since I have just received these beautiful and comfortable gloves today, I have admired their fine quality and tried them on only inside the house. Their touch screen feature works on operating my cell phone. Later I will be wearing them outside and will discover whether they keep my hands as warm as I anticipate. At this point I am wishing I had them in additional colors!
customer_reviews.author: Q. P. A.

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great! True to size and extremely soft; it's like wearing a hug on your hands. This winter has been grueling but these Isotoners keep my hands toasty warm. Product is even better than described!
customer_reviews.author: Christina M Melotti

customer_reviews.title: They Seem To Run Small
customer_reviews.text: Runs small IMO...I don't have small hands though... I'm almost 6ft and have long fingers and wide hands and the XL just barely fits.....it fits ok to keep them, most fully leather gloves are too tight....these have enough stretch I think. A bit shorter on the wrist than I hoped for though.
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaDreamin

customer_reviews.title: Useful basic driving gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Useful basic driving gloves. My hands are on the large size, and they stretch to fit fine. There’s enough leather on the palms to create good traction between your hands on the steering wheel. Not for the coldest weather outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: MSWTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Bulky, but Warm and Great for Big Hands
customer_reviews.text: Warm, a bit bulky and clumsy, and sufficiently Large enough for my freakishly Large hands! Yea, buddy!!! You can't type in them(our warehouse at work is often 55-60 degrees indoors😆) and it's hard to do things like buckle a seat belt in them. But if you go for long walks in the cold they're awesome 👍.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen C.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I used to love these gloves, but after I lost one of my gloves of my previous set, I had to buy new ones and these are not at all good. The fingers barely work with my smart phone. Makes me even think that these are fake isotoners, because my isotoners in the past have been so good!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: SmartTouch feature does not work!
customer_reviews.text: The gloves look nice, but they do NOT allow for smartphone handlimg, disappointed that this feature appears on the advertisement, and on the tag itself, but doesn't work. Perhaps there is something that needs to be done?
customer_reviews.author: Customer83

customer_reviews.title: Great driving gloves
customer_reviews.text: I use these gloves as daily coolder weather gloves. They are suprisingly warm, well made, and are excellent driving gloves, also great for everyday winter gloves. Not made for sub zero cold, but perfect for everyday.
customer_reviews.author: N. Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Leather Gloves
customer_reviews.text: They run small. Based on their size chart, my hand width -- 7.75 inches -- would be a medium. So I was torn, do I buy a Small/Medium or a Large/Extra Large? I ordered the Large/Extra Large and they are tight! The touch-screen fingertips do not work well at all. I would need to take off the gloves to use my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Cash

customer_reviews.title: Too samll
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are just too small. I will keep them as I don't wear them often anyway but if you have a hard time finding gloves that fit...well these won't "really" fit eaither. The fingers are just too short and the part around the base of the thumb doesn't quite fit right. Sigh...
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: I love Isotoner gloves but...
customer_reviews.text: As always I have to have Isotoner gloves to get through New England winters. The only drawback to these for me was that they run a bit large for someone has small hands. I am probably more like an XS/Small than a Small/medium which as the only option. Otherwise, they are great gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. G

customer_reviews.title: DONT DO IT!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to love Isotoner gloves - these were $ an didnt fit my hands at ALLLLLLL!The thumbs were too big they went over my thumbs backwards- They were TOOO tight- even tho they were Large- X-Large- It sux cuz it's 17degrees- an my hands are freezing!!!ALWAYS try them on!!!!!!!!boo hiss
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Run very small.
customer_reviews.text: These ran very small and I could not even try on. Returned and bought another brand, which worked fine. I am have been an Isotoner fan for many years, but no more.
customer_reviews.author: Sarisack

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these gloves
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these gloves! I researched many since I needed something that would allow me to grip my cane well when it's cold. These work great! I have longer fingers and these stretch very well.
customer_reviews.author: LEX

customer_reviews.title: Good looking tech gloves
customer_reviews.text: These look nice and I never have to take my glove off to answer my phone, change a song or text a friend. I took one star off because in very cold weather my fingers are not kept warm. However for where I live and mostly travel, these are great
customer_reviews.author: Ellababe

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Fit is a bit small. Had to get L/XL for my elderly mom but she does love them. Said they look really classy and are the nicest gloves she's had.
customer_reviews.author: B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: She loves them! They look good, fit well and keep her hands toasty warm while being very flexible. Been buying Isotoner gloves for decades and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Robert1969

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are very nice, but Too padded for kind I want. I just wanted driving gloves, no padding.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Warm gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are warm. It is perfect for gloves. It is not near as good as mittens to keep my fingers warm, but if you need gloves these fit well and do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hawk

customer_reviews.title: I rarely give 5 stars, but these gloves come close.
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn these once, but having worn Isotoner gloves for many years, I'm not disappointed, but they are of different materials than my last pair and it remains to be seen how well they will wear.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Walker

customer_reviews.title: High quality and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my wife for Christmas and she wears them daily. High quality, well fitting, and she says very comfortable. She's able to use her electronic device screen while wearing without difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter748driver

customer_reviews.title: I liked them, My daughter hated them
customer_reviews.text: I liked them. good fit. The smart touch was about 80% for me. I bought the same pair for my daughter. She hated the touch as it did not work well with her slightly older phone. She ended up just taking the gloves off completely. She is 21 and did like the fit.
customer_reviews.author: BAS

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying isotoner products for over 25 years. I'm happy with these gloves. Smart technology is great, I'm able to keep gloves on and use me iphone.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Isotoner nearly always hits the mark on fit. Tried other glove for Xmas and fit was way off for a smaller hand like mine. Went back to Isotoner and fit was great.
customer_reviews.author: CWK

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect all the time
customer_reviews.text: Classy, my favorite mark. I did have 4 pairs when I was living in Boston. Excellent. Perfect workmanship. Stylish.
customer_reviews.author: marie josie Prou

customer_reviews.title: Need A Little more room
customer_reviews.text: The gloves could have been a little larger; from the edge of my wrist to my longest finger is 8 inches. I bought the L/XL. Good quality gloves.
customer_reviews.author: D. K.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Got them as a Christmas present for my wife. She loves them
customer_reviews.author: Todd Kilde

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I see lots of gloves on the market. But these are by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: OverComer Now

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are exactly everything I wanted in smart touch gloves. They are stylish, they fit nicely and, most importantly, they work! Now I can stay warm and use my phone at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: kjs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Isotoner and they proved it again.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: The gloves are good quality and feel good when I wear them
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are good quality and feel good when I wear them. They run really small though. I got a L/XL and I've had to stretch them a lot to get them on.
customer_reviews.author: mo4freedom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect warm gloves
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. Stretchable so they always fit perfectly and I can still use my cell phone while I have them on. The only problem is I keep losing one of them!
customer_reviews.author: LibraryLois

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: These run small. I have small hands so it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these gloves! Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: These gloves run small
customer_reviews.text: The sizing was off. I usually wear a medium, unfortunately s/m was my only option. I will probably not order gloves from you again
customer_reviews.author: A L Danforth

customer_reviews.title: Great gloes
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves, perfect fit, and the electronic pads work really well. Hated taking off a glove to enter my car.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Cogburn

customer_reviews.title: Know your size
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gloves, typical Isotoner quality. Unfortunately they were too small so I had to return them. I wish there was a Medium/Large size option, which would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tx SLP

customer_reviews.title: touchscreen texting does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: They shouldn't advertise that you can text with gloves on. The only reason I rated this product as high as a 3 is that the gloves are comfortable. But make no mistake- you can NOT use your phone with the gloves on
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: Great for small hands.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my small hands. Very sophisticated and good look for work business casual. It is not as warm as I like and not wind proof but does the job. I like the underside was stretchy sonit hugged my hands. Great grip for driving in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: VRPHON

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are beautiful, comfortable and warm. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for !
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for wife . Have not open package yet to see if they are as described.
customer_reviews.author: Hoehandle

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Glove
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are so nice! Great fit. Great quality. Even nicer than the picture portrays.
customer_reviews.author: donnamonta

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are beautiful and warm, but fit is a bit too small.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L Noettl

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: I like the style but it is made Barbie. I have real fingers. Can't you make a better fitting glove?
customer_reviews.author: Michel Jean Paller

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about them!
customer_reviews.text: I needed gloves and I’ve always liked Isotoner. They fit well, the materials are high quality, they’re everything I want in gloves !
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lipman Green

customer_reviews.title: the gloves are beautifully made and the quality is top notch
customer_reviews.text: the gloves are beautifully made and the quality is top notch. unfortunately i ordered a L/XL and they are more like a SMALL.
customer_reviews.author: Frances J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Poor Stitches
customer_reviews.text: This product came apart at the seams, subsequently, tearing the leather. The stitching was very poor between the fingers which in turn, led to the leather splitting. Do not purchase, I am very very very disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. She loves the way they fit and feel.
customer_reviews.author: dapace

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift so I have no comments to make.
customer_reviews.author: John Woodbury

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable... don't put them down someone will steal them. That is what happened. Going to buy more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit small, short in length
customer_reviews.text: Mine have a scratch across the back of one of them. They fit smaller than expected and are short.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Parris

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable gloves for driving and just look nice on my hands. I was brought up wearing gloves for all formal occasions and church. These gloves fit beautiful, give my hand support and are easy to drive with. I have loved Isotoners for years.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Irwin

customer_reviews.title: She loved the gloves
customer_reviews.text: But the fingers were too short. Had to return. Would buy correct size again if available.
customer_reviews.author: lon sanders

customer_reviews.title: terrible sizing
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these in the S/M size, and they were too small. I purchased them as L/XL and they were the same size. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: ricatao

customer_reviews.title: These were great, and they are warm
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my wife for Christmas. She was thrilled! She has big hands and most gloves wont fit. These were great, and they are warm.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: She really enjoys the fit and function. Great for driving
customer_reviews.author: john m zitney

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous gloves
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! They fit well and the price was excellent too.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael King

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: The leather is soft and smooth, the inside soft and warm. Very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a... glove... pun intended.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Mom for Christmas, she loved them. They look very sleek.
customer_reviews.author: The Hirtes

customer_reviews.title: Warm but doesn’t work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Description says can use smart phone with these gloves on - this is not true.
customer_reviews.author: JRG

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I live in Montana where it's cold and snows for 7 months. Isotoner gloves keep my hands warm all of the time. Weather + comfort had my favorite gloves for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: cali2mt

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is small period
customer_reviews.text: Item is a small not small/medium. If you need a medium then order a large/xl
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Look good and feel great. And of course they work for using your iPhone. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price, fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves, great fit, love the color. You can never go wrong with Isotoner gloves.
customer_reviews.author: TrueSouthernBelle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Used these gloves for 2 years, wonderful, finally wore out.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Stick with Isotoners!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Isotoner gloves! I finally had to buy a new pair because the pair I had for about 15 years wore out.
customer_reviews.author: TazGirl

customer_reviews.title: Fits Like A Glove
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like isotoner: I always look for them on sale. Fit as expected.The two-tone red is a bit odd.
customer_reviews.author: The Empress

customer_reviews.title: Isotoner gloves are.
customer_reviews.text: My gloves were a perfect fit. They just slid on. I love isotoner gloves. They have the most comfortable fabric of any other gloves I've tried
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Phairis

customer_reviews.title: These work great!! Best gloves I've had for smart touch ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great!! Best gloves I've had for smart touch and they're warm too!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J.

customer_reviews.title: Refund has not been issued.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item February 6 because they were too small. I received a message that a refund has been issued. It's February 28 and I still have not received the refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Awful product! Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Started falling apart after a week of wear. Also, they run big. Have been wearing Isotoner for years, have always worn well. These are cheap and not made well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leather gloves
customer_reviews.text: My hands are nice and warm on this cold mornings.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaJW

customer_reviews.title: TRYING TO RETURN. NO IMPRESSED AT ALL,
customer_reviews.text: Please e-mail me a return label. Your code doesn't work. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan humble

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: So soft and a great fit. Love the tech touch
customer_reviews.author: Katie Jean

customer_reviews.title: great gloves
customer_reviews.text: perfect for me while driving, and not uncomfortable. love the color
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Slip slides on the wheel without leather palm!!!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but the palm isn't leather and it doesn't grip the steering wheel!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made-leather
customer_reviews.text: These were for a gift, but I was very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not work as touchscreen
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I oredered these is that it said it would work with touchscreen. They DONT work at all. Do not buy these if u are hoping to use them with your phone!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kwann

customer_reviews.title: Products do as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: They were advertised as being able to use them with your smartphone. They do not work in the touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Dawne Miles

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves
customer_reviews.text: Fit very well, sleek and classy looking, great to drive with, love them.
customer_reviews.author: JaneColorado

customer_reviews.title: Came apart in a month
customer_reviews.text: I loved these gloves but the glove and lining separated after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, though
customer_reviews.text: These run small. I ordered a size larger, but there is no room to spare. Nice quality, though.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Schmid

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little on the small side, but effective gloves for typing on your iphone!
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Hatjygeorge

customer_reviews.title: I will never order these again
customer_reviews.text: The gloves run too small I ordered an extra large in they look like a small size
customer_reviews.author: Lora Foreman

customer_reviews.title: One size does not fit all hands
customer_reviews.text: The Isotoners were ready classy but my hands did not fit the XL gloves I think I need 1X if they are made
customer_reviews.author: tonie nelson

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves,quick service!
customer_reviews.text: Gloves fit on the small size, so order up 1 size overall though they are great gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Wore a week and started to split at seams
customer_reviews.text: My Aunt wore her gloves for a week and they are already splitting at the seems. I thought Isotoner was a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: My Wife loves them, they keep her hands toasty warm.
customer_reviews.author: COL C

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves, no screen access
customer_reviews.text: Lovely gloves. Still cannot use my phone with them on, though.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Harness

customer_reviews.title: Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love my pretty new red gloves! Good quality and a very rich red color.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana Hayes

customer_reviews.title: I love my gloves!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is wonderful, they are extremely soft, and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: javamama

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of these gloves. My grandmother will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality.. XL is a little snug on my size 7 hand but it isn't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: sharmaine moss

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: Isotoner has excellent merchandise. I'm going to really enjoy these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: astrologys Flame

customer_reviews.title: Item came just as described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered gloves - the color and size were as expected - and they came promptly in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Black

product_meta.title: isotoner Women's Classic Stretch Leather Touchscreen Cold Weather Gloves, Fleece Lining
product_meta.description:
Keep warm without compromising your style with isotoner Women's Stretch Leather Touchscreen Gloves. Genuine leather with stretchable spandex flex points perfectly contours around your hands for a custom fit, and a cozy fleece lining wraps your hands in supreme warmth. smarTouch technology is touchscreen enabled so you don’t have to choose between keeping in touch and keeping warm. Chic detailing and sophisticated style transitions seamlessly between work and a night out




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :8.9 x 3.3 x 1.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces
 * Item model number :40262
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :August 29, 2016
 * Manufacturer :isotoner
 * ASIN :B01I7GQE26

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #145,200 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #65269 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #91 inWomen's Cold Weather Gloves 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars443 ratings Keep warm without compromising your style with isotoner Women's Stretch Leather Touchscreen Gloves. Genuine leather with stretchable spandex flex points perfectly contours around your hands for a custom fit, and a cozy fleece lining wraps your hands in supreme warmth. smarTouch technology is touchscreen enabled so you don’t have to choose between keeping in touch and keeping warm. Chic detailing and sophisticated style transitions seamlessly between work and a night out
feature_bullets: Classic design and fit: Genuine stretch leather texting gloves blended with spandex for a high-end timeless style and the perfect contour fit.
Stay warm: Stretchy soft fleece lining provides a contoured fit with a layer of silky softness for a custom fit for the perfect balance of warmth, style and comfort.

Stay connected: Equipped with smarTouch touchscreen technology in thumbs and index fingers enables smart phone and tablet use allowing you to tap and swipe with precision and ease while keeping hands warm in the cold weather. No glove is more accurate and compatible while using an iphone, ipad, kindle, tablets, android, Galaxy, Note and all mobile devices.
Stay stylish: Palm strips for extra grip; Super sleek and classically styled available in fun prints and colors- perfect for work or a night on the town.
